attributes.action: Reduce prices on car insurance quotes
attributes.background: Look I am a young driver on the uk road and I have recently found it hard to afford to run my car. This is not due to fuel expenses or tax. This is the price I’m paying for insurance. The value of my car or even the size does not compare to the price that I’m paying for my insurance quote

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of insurance, but we could accept a petition calling for the Government to introduce a cap on car insurance for young people, if that's something you'd like to see. We've also published these petitions which you may wish to sign: 

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
